header.titulo: The Wake Experience x La Real
header.parrafo: From La Real, we invite you to come and discover the best parks in our country and enjoy Argentine culture and cuisine.

experiencias.exp1: Come share with us an epic day full of wakeboarding and also discover the best of Argentine cuisine.
experiencias.exp2: We offer you a week full of Wakeboarding in the best parks in Argentina with the best instructors.
experiencias.exp3: Write to us and let's create the perfect experience tailored for you.
